ch0133_00_shilver/0101_0701_01_10:
Hm? Oh, it’s you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Have you gotten any stronger?
ch0133_00_shilver/0101_0701_02_10:
I already know who’ll win, but let’s battle.
If you’re up to it, that is.
ch0133_00_shilver/0601_0701_02_10:
Doesn’t matter whether they’re weak Pokémon or
they’re worthless Trainers who can’t bring out their
Pokémon’s strength.
ch0133_00_shilver/0601_0701_03_10:
That’s why my partner Pokémon and I follow
the strictest training regimen. It’s all to become
the strongest.
ch0133_00_shilver/0601_0702_01_10:
If a Pokémon is weak or loses a battle, its
Trainer has only themself to blame.
ch0133_00_shilver/0602_0701_01_10:
I hate seeing weak Pokémon and Trainers just
loafing around in battle.
ch0133_00_shilver/0602_0701_02_10:
They always just stand there, acting all important,
as if they know what they’re doing...
ch0133_00_shilver/0602_0701_03_10:
I hate weaklings like that. We’ll train so we won’t
have to rely on them.
ch0133_00_shilver/0602_0702_01_10: Don’t go associating with weaklings, got it?
ch0133_00_shilver/0602_0702_02_10:
Losers who annoy me get to learn their lesson
real quick.
ch0133_00_shilver/0603_0701_01_10:
There’s a lot of Trainers on Pasio from regions I’m
not familiar with...
ch0133_00_shilver/0603_0701_02_10:
I was just aiming to become the strongest Trainer
in Johto, but it seems there are even more Trainers
I need to defeat in this vast world.
ch0133_00_shilver/0603_0701_03_10:
Hmph! Fine. Whether it’s on Pasio or anywhere
else, I’ll still aim to be the strongest!
ch0133_00_shilver/0603_0702_01_10: Tell me if you hear of any strong sync pairs.
ch0133_00_shilver/0603_0702_02_10: My Pokémon and I will smash them to pieces!
ch0133_00_shilver/0604_0701_01_10: I used to not care how I trained or how I won.
ch0133_00_shilver/0604_0701_02_10:
But eventually I realized that wasn’t the way to
truly get stronger.
ch0133_00_shilver/0604_0701_03_10: I wish I knew that a long time ago...
ch0133_00_shilver/0604_0702_01_10:
Those guys going around taking Pokémon from
people... They’re called Team Break, right?
ch0133_00_shilver/0604_0702_02_10:
Tch! They really bug me. Only weaklings do stuff
like that.
ch0133_00_shilver/0604_0702_03_10:
I used to do stupid things like that, but I decided
I couldn’t keep acting that way if I wanted to
become the strongest Trainer.
ch0133_00_shilver/0605_0701_01_10: There’s someone I have to surpass...
ch0133_00_shilver/0605_0701_02_10:
He’s supposedly a stronger Trainer than me, so I
have to defeat him and prove that’s a lie.
ch0133_00_shilver/0605_0701_03_10:
I’ll endure any harsh training if it means reaching
that goal.
ch0133_00_shilver/0605_0702_01_10:
Why did you become a Pokémon Trainer,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0133_00_shilver/0605_0702_02_10: You need to have a goal as a Trainer.
ch0133_00_shilver/0605_0702_03_10:
Having a goal makes it easier to know how you
should train.
ch0133_00_shilver/1701_0701_01_10:
Tch, hey! I was looking for you. Don’t make me
waste my time like that...
ch0133_00_shilver/1701_0701_02_10:
I’m giving this to you. It’ll help you get a
little stronger.
ch0133_00_shilver/1701_0702_01_10: Good items are worthless if you don’t use them.
ch0133_00_shilver/2501_0701_01_10: What do you think you need to get stronger?
ch0133_00_shilver/2501_0701_02_10:
Strong Pokémon? Lots of training? Those are both
important, but...
ch0133_00_shilver/2501_0701_03_10:
the answer is a rival you don’t want to lose
to—someone you want to destroy at any cost.
You won’t slack off with that kind of motivation.
ch0133_00_shilver/2501_0702_01_10:
That Trainer... Next time we meet, I’ll definitely
beat him.
ch0133_00_shilver/2501_0702_02_10:
When I battle him, I’ll make sure you’re on
my team!
ch0133_00_shilver/2511_0701_01_10:
It’s impossible to become the strongest sync pair
just by having the strongest Pokémon.
ch0133_00_shilver/2511_0701_02_10:
I thought that if I had the most powerful Pokémon,
it would be enough, but...
ch0133_00_shilver/2511_0701_03_10:
it’s pointless unless I become the greatest Trainer
in the world, too.
ch0133_00_shilver/2511_0702_01_10:
A long time ago, someone told me that I didn’t
trust or love my Pokémon enough.
ch0133_00_shilver/2511_0702_02_10:
A few things happened, and afterward I began
to understand what that person meant.
ch0133_00_shilver/2511_0702_03_10:
Doesn’t seem like you’ve got that problem, though.
You always believe in your Pokémon.
ch0133_00_shilver/3001_0701_01_10:
Go splash water on your face! There’s nothing fun
about battling someone who’s only half awake.
ch0133_00_shilver/3002_0701_01_10:
Not a bad morning... Perfect for training.
I can go with you if you ask nicely.
ch0133_00_shilver/3003_0701_01_10:
Go on and laze around. While you’re napping,
I’ll get even stronger.
ch0133_00_shilver/3004_0701_01_10:
Aim even higher than the sun. You’ll never
become the greatest if you don’t aim high.
ch0133_00_shilver/3005_0701_01_10:
Are you tired? Then go rest. Overworking yourself
doesn’t do you or your Pokémon any good.
ch0133_00_shilver/3006_0701_01_10:
Remember to take care of your Pokémon... I’ve
learned it’s important if you want to get stronger.
